actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-409.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 409 - 17 (Record Vote No: 452).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3525) to amend title 3, United States Code, to establish uniform regional poll closing times in the continental United States for Presidential general elections.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3525 (poll closing times).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3525) to amend title 3, United States Code, to establish uniform regional poll closing times in the continental United States for Presidential general elections.
